website_summaries.verdict: The Lily Pod cradle is a superb choice for a comfortable cradle for your newborn. Your baby will be soothed by gentle rocking motions and it can be carried from room to room with ease. A modern yet cozy design, your baby will sleep peacefully in this grey or sand-colored cradle.
pros: Spacious though it doesn't take up much surface area in a room
Travels well and comes with a tote bag
cons: The included mattress is very thin
It's a higher price point for a cradle of its size

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bassinet. It is beautiful and well designed. The best part is my baby actually sleeps in it. When he starts to wake up it rocks and puts him back to sleep. It is also really easy to pack up and travel with. The mattress that came with it is not waterproof so we replaced it with a naturepedic organic cotton bassinet mattress and it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Neely

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfecting with a co-sleeper pillow like SnuggleMe or DockATot
customer_reviews.text: Our baby girl loved this bassinet. We had a SnuggleMe organic pillow that fit perfectly in here. I'm sure a DockATot would fit in here too. We used it for about 4 months until she outgrew it. We even brought it with us when we traveled and was fairly easy to take set up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and portable
customer_reviews.text: Our newborn sleeps in this bassinet next to our bed. We like that it is stylish and lightweight. It was very easy to put together and comes with a travel bag that we will later use for storing it away. I like that it gently rocks while the baby moves and has mesh windows on the sides to let in air. Our newborn sleeps well in it. Purchased American Baby Company bassinet sheets that fit the foam mattress perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Feynman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: They have truly amazing customer service!!! I had a problem with the mattress, my email was answered within a few hours and by the end of the day I was provided FedEx tracking # for new mattress (free of charge). This was priceless with a few day old infant at home who needed the bassinet! I highly recommend the seller and the product. The bassinet looks stylish, elegant, it is comfy, we use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Toma Dirmantaite

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: We requested this item on our baby registry and it's perfect for putting right next to the bed with an infant. My daughter is now 7 months old and still sleeping in it next to the bed. We'll transition her out of this bassinet when she begins pulling herself up. If you need the fancy add ons like vibration... consider buying a separate vibrator off amazon that is $15 (which is what I did) but then never used it. The see-through hole is nice too because the child can see you through it. Perfect item for the nursery!
customer_reviews.author: Jillene

customer_reviews.title: Traditional rocking motion is a lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: We bought and returned Venice baby bassinet. It was beautiful, with awesome modern materials that looked easy to wipe off. Unfortunately it was ineffective - when we went to rock the baby it was more like a jerking clunking motion. So not exactly bassinet material. I replaced it with this item. The material looks plush and nice, not as modern as Venice baby but in terms of solidity - not bad. Aluminum legs on top of wood rocker base legs. BUT when you go to rock it’s a traditional, soft, real rocking movement. I know it’ll come in handy when baby is awoken post feeding and diaper changes to rock him gently back to sleep
customer_reviews.author: Ioni

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & minimalistic
customer_reviews.text: Kept this in our bedroom next to our bed and our daughter seems to love it. It moves when she does and is easy to setup, move around the room and clean. Bought Burt’s bees bassinet sheets to go with it and they fit perfect. Dock a tot fits perfectly inside it too.... though I know you’re not supposed to do that ;)
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Enuco

customer_reviews.title: Creeking sound
customer_reviews.text: Make lot of creeking sound . It was so expensive and kind of feel that quality is missing.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul Shrivastava

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: We have some paint chipped on one of legs and there are screws exposed on one side of the wooden rocker. Either it’s a design flaw (not having screws face inside on BOTH sides) or I was given two of the same leg. Not sure I like how the fabric pulls over the top - seams are covered on three sides but not fourth. I have tried to adjust it but no change. These things are a bit of a letdown on appearance. Seems okay otherwise. Admittedly bought this based mainly on looks - hope baby likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bassinet! Not only it is stylish but it also is so easy to move around and carry with us since it is so light. Baby sleeps really well in it. I love the simple design, the mesh windows for air flow and the fact that I can gently rock my baby back to sleep. Very happy with my purchase and I recommend it if you are looking for a simple, stylish, quality and comfy baby crib! :)
customer_reviews.author: elaine b

customer_reviews.title: This bassinet is so easy to move and I love how it looks in ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bassinet. We bought this initially just to use in our living room as we had the Halo Bassinet for the bedroom. Well she is now 2 months old and we have yet to use the Halo Bassinet. This bassinet is so easy to move and I love how it looks in our living room and bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: Well Designed and functional. Materials are high quality and our baby has been sleeping in this for a couple weeks now. She is sleeping well and had her first night of 5 straight hours of sleep at 5 weeks old. We have had good luck with this after 3 weeks of horrible nights with another bassinet. Could just be her settling into life. This bassinet looks good and we rock her back to bed when she starts squirming.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic1971

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the rocking feature
customer_reviews.text: This item is lightweight and easy to assemble, but rocking feature is a little jerky and I am returning because of that. I think if it were heavier, it would rock more smoothly. I also didn’t like the cheap-feeling foam pad that came with it, I would have preferred something more like the firmness of a pack n play pad. Great idea, but could use some tweaking to make it a great product.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: The first bassinet we saw without the threat of deadly! Super scary looking for products and reading all the one stars....have been using for almost 4 months and would rebuy this in a heartbeat
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Mattress is not great quality
customer_reviews.text: The bassinet itself is ok, but the mattress is terrible. After only one week of use, it's indented from where our little one sleeps and no longer covers the entire bottom of the bassinet. Very unsafe. Will be purchasing new separate mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thoughtfully designed and packaged bassinet at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I was really nervous that this bassinet would look or feel 'cheap'. It's not high-end but it's very functional and thoughtfully packaged (carrying bag included). The quilted fabric has a satin-like finish. It was super easy to assemble at 8-months pregnant, and I like that it is more minimal than other similarly priced bassinets. The mattress pad is plush enough and comes with its own cover. I was really happy with this as soon as it came out of the box! It's at exactly standard bed height, which will make it easy to see the baby at night.
customer_reviews.author: Nb

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $200
customer_reviews.text: I hate this bassinet so much. If I could return it, I would. I got this bassinet 4 months before baby was due and now I’m past the return window and it’s just sitting in the closet unused. I hate how low it is, baby wakes up every time I put her down to sleep. There’s nothing special about it and it’s definitely not worth $200!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, looks beautiful in our room
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to put together. No tools needed. I think it would be just as easy for travel as a pack and play. It even comes with a carrying case. Our baby isn’t born yet, but we can’t wait to use it. I did order the one with a square window because the one with the round window wasn’t coming back in to stock. The one that arrived actually had the round window, which I was happy about! However, it’s not what I ordered so that could be an issue for others.
customer_reviews.author: Kmreyn

customer_reviews.title: Safe sleep that works
customer_reviews.text: Love that it rocks. Instead of having to hold and bounce baby to get him back to sleep, I can just reach over and lightly rock it for a couple of minutes while he settles, instead of getting out of bed. Does not always work, but cuts down on times our of bed. It rocks when he moves as well
customer_reviews.author: ycyvcyc

customer_reviews.title: High quality and worth your money
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this bassinet and it is worth every penny. Our son has been sleeping in it for three months now. It is sturdy, spacious, made of high quality material, has a simple and classy look ... love that. Our son likes to kick his legs and when does that he ends up rocking himself as the bassinet is designed to do that... brilliant! We've placed it right next to our bed and we can rock him with one hand while lying in bed. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Njoki

customer_reviews.title: ... yet (my baby's due in January) but I'm in love with how it looks
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this bassinet yet (my baby's due in January) but I'm in love with how it looks, the little space it takes in the room, its gorgeous moderns design, the super easy installment and its sturdyness. It also looks pretty easy to move within the house and to wash, and it came with a black bag to pack it on, which was a cute and practical extra. Really happy with my purchase as for now! If something changes when I start using it I'll let you know.
customer_reviews.author: kari

customer_reviews.title: We are thinking of returning this item because the paint ...
customer_reviews.text: We are thinking of returning this item because the paint is peeling off the legs and all we did was set it up and try to rock it. I'm looking for a product that does not have lots of chemicals and the last thing I want is paint peeling anywhere near my baby. I don't know if my item was defective or if all of the bassinets do this, but I would hope its just mine since I did not read any reviews mentioning paint peeling off upon setup.
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this bassinet. It is well made and sturdy and I feel very comfortable putting my baby in it. We first had the Chicco Lullababy and it was horribly wobbly and the mattress was in two pieces with a seam down the middle. I like that it has rockers and the wheels make it easy to move from room to room. Has a classy/modern look to it. Can be assembled/disassembled within a minute. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: A Wishart

customer_reviews.title: Get it!!!!! Read rewiew!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best. Worth the money. Easy assembly and take down, ( comes with a carrying case). Fits in a motel and in my toy hauler as we gone camping. ****** only thing I did to make this better is that I felt on the bottom from lowes or home depot because the wooden rocker would scratch my hard wood floor ********* all in all get it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dominic R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have bought for my kiddos. I would get something else for the mattress though as it is stiff and baby won’t sleep just with pad alone. Looks really nice in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Renata

customer_reviews.title: Great bassinet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bassinet when my granddaughter was born last September. I was looking for a bassinet that was beautiful, and easy to assemble,disassemble and store. This bassinet is all of the above. Assembly was a breeze. It took about 5 minutes from beginning to end. Taking it apart was just as simple. It comes with a travel bag, which is great for storage. I am very pleased with the quality of the bassinet. It is very sturdy and rocks gently. My granddaughter was very comfortable sleeping in it. Customer service was excellent. Very accommodating, beyond my expectations. I would highly recommend this bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: erica badani

customer_reviews.title: Not for us
customer_reviews.text: Uses it only once since we bought it. When baby moves, i.e. baby kicks, he moves to the edge of the bassinet which puts the weight on one end with his head. This is dangerous for the baby as the body is tilted and sleeps with the head lower than the body. I wanted to return it but I had gotten rid of the box. It is a great design but unfortunately we did not get a use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: azh

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: As far as putting it together: it was so easy and I love the bag to travel with. It is light weight enough to travel with and move wherever you need in the house. It is a nice looking modern piece that looks great in our nursery. Baby isn’t here yet but I’m sure he will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Posthumus

customer_reviews.title: Thin mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Well the bassinet itself is nice. It was very easy to put together. It rolls and rocks nicely. Unfortunately, the company says that it comes with a “good quality mattress that will support a baby's weight up to 20 lbs”. I was surprised to see how thin the matress was when it came in. I hope baby likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Yarletts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bassinet for my daughter’s baby and it is a wonderful product! It is a little bigger and deeper than other bassinets I looked at. Because of the size she will be able to use the bassinet longer. The rocking motion is smooth and quiet. Standard sheets and bassinet pad fit perfectly on the mattress! It is lightweight and easy to move from room to room! We are so excited about this bassinet and cannot wait to rock the baby to sleep in it! I recommend this product. You will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous bassinet, took me a couple minutes to put it together by myself and I love it! Has wheels so I can move the bassinet around as needed, and it is a nice size!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: good looking, compact and functional
customer_reviews.text: One of the best baby product that I have.. nice looking, compact and functional Plus: my big baby used it for 8 months. worth the money
customer_reviews.author: berkin

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought this bassinet for our granddaughter due to arrive in May so we can't comment yet on how well it will work for her. It did arrive right on time and was easy to assemble. Our daughter and husband love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jean P.

customer_reviews.title: A very nice Baby Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and very sturdy. My 4 years old loves climbing into the bassinet and pretend to be a baby, and sometime climbing into it his little baby brother. Scared me, but I am so glad that this bassinet is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: FujiZ

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful bassinet that is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bassinet that is easy to clean, assemble and disassemble. Most importantly it is a safe sleep space for our new born who appears to sleep well in it and enjoy the rocking feature! The only issue we had was finding a mattress protector that fit it and sheets properly since the instructions say not to wash the pad.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Donohue

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to travel with it!
customer_reviews.text: My son and daughter in law absolutely LOVE this! It’s something that they will keep in the family as long as it holds up! Just awesome how easy it is to break down and store or travel with it! She loved having the baby right next to her for breast feeding in the middle of the night! Worth every penny! Well made and very chic looking!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small for a grown up
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and easy to assemble. I couldn’t fit in it very well being nearly 6’ 160lbs, but my son will probably enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Scales

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We love this bassinet! We wanted something that fit the decor of our room but also that would be great for our baby. The mesh siding allows you to see your baby always. When our baby moves it provides gentle rocking which helps soothe her. It’s veey light weight and comes in a great bag to travel with!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Caruso

customer_reviews.title: worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: my infant hasn't had a chance to sleep in it yet, but this bassinet was exactly what i was looking for with style, sturdiness, and assembly. i also love the fact it comes with a carry tote! i am very confident my soon to be newborn will love it as much as i do.
customer_reviews.author: Makenna

customer_reviews.title: Great, portable bassinet alternative
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, easy to disassemble and pack. It’s also aesthetically pleasing. It may seem pricey but compared to other bassinets like the Halo it’s definitely not pricey.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely GORGEOUS bassinet. Goes perfectly in my son’s nursery and arrived a lot sooner than expected! There was a small chip in bottom rocker leg and when I contacted seller he immediately sent another! Couldn't be happier with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Romina

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item! Grey color is really nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought as an extra for my house , love the design!
customer_reviews.author: Rita baltensperger

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design and functionality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design and functionality. I love that you can move it around so easily. My newborn sleeps great in it. I had a small issue with my order and their customer service was very responsive and helpful!
customer_reviews.author: jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice modern bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice modern bassinet. Also very easy to move around to either side of the bed. Looks very good with my decor. Baby took to the bassinet quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jackiesomething

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bassinet
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and portability of this bassinet. It's very easy to maneuver around hard wood floors without scratching them and the design looks sleek and clean. The customer service reps are amazing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Furiousz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute bassinet! Easy to put together and take apart. Will travel well and comes with tote bag. Durable and stylish. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Miller

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: exactly what daughter expected. She said it was her favorite shower gift
customer_reviews.author: Etta Keehn

customer_reviews.title: The best bassinet ever!
customer_reviews.text: Very light and sturdy. I loved it, so my baby nephew.
customer_reviews.author: SaraM

customer_reviews.title: ... this bassinet for my little one and I really like it a lot - the color is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Got this bassinet for my little one and I really like it a lot - the color is beautiful. I like how there are two mesh openings on the side of the bassinet so that I can see my little one. I also like that I can easily rock her while she's in the bassinet as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had my eye on this bassinet for months and I am so glad I decided to purchase it. It is not only adorable, but I am super happy with the quality! It is easy to assemble and break down, and great for traveling. I love that baby has a safe place for sleeping and that it is so easy to move around!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Quality costs - but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.text: a bit pricier than the other items out there, but it's worth the money. Materials are top notch and the entire package is extremely easy to put together (and I absolutely HATE putting things together).
customer_reviews.author: Kaustav

customer_reviews.title: Love my new bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: Baby is due any day and I cannot wait to use this bassinet. It was easy to assemble. It’s lightweight so it’s easy to move from room to room. And I love that it rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Martin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: This is lovely and I cannot wait to use it! It's incredibly beautiful and very sturdy. It took all of five minutes to assemble and comes with a large carry case, so it appears to be easy to transport. Definitely pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Aly W

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: We love our green frog bassinet. My husband said it was easy to assemble and very sturdy. I love the wheels which make it super mobile. Our baby girl should arrive in a few weeks and can't wait to use it with her! Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: That we were very pleased with your product.
customer_reviews.text: The green frog bassinet is incredible! Extremely easy to essemble and very sturdy. I know our baby will rest well in it. It will be so easy to travel with as well. I would highly recommend the Green Frog bassinet to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Davenport

customer_reviews.title: I loved this bassinet
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bassinet. Very clean and stylish. It serves its purpose. I bought an extra bassinet protector and a sheet for extra comfort and protection. It’s also very easy to take apart and put together and comes with a large caddy for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great bassinet and easy to travel with!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bassinet! So easy to have next to the bed and we have traveled with it several times. Baby sleeps great especially with the snuggle me organic that fits perfectly inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the modern design of this bassinet. It very roomy. Love how it is a lower bassinet there fit perfect next to my bed. So happy p. Hope my baby will love it too.
customer_reviews.author: P. G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! It’s super light weight and very potable. Perfect for room sharing at night and also great for daytime naps. The rocking is very subtle and my baby loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Prashant Shah

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot wait to use this for the baby! 19 days and counting ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Cline

customer_reviews.title: Great for newborns
customer_reviews.text: We use this is our living room as a bassinet, and our newborn daughter rests well in it. It rocks smoothly and set up took less than 5 mins. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: amy lynn

customer_reviews.title: This bassinet is PERFECT! I will also say their customer service team ...
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet is PERFECT! I will also say their customer service team was amazing too! They were very easy to work with and they helped me make sure I was getting what I wanted. I would 100% recommend this for your new babe.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Allis

customer_reviews.title: So Easy To Set Up... Sturdily Built
customer_reviews.text: Really excited about this product. Set up was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Milton

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Easy to assemble GrandBaby not here yet. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Owen

customer_reviews.title: The Baby Loves It❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this bassinet and it was sooo easy to put together as well the only complaint I have is there isn’t enough girly sheets for this one
customer_reviews.author: Reva

customer_reviews.title: It was so easy to assemble and they love it
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our nephew's baby. It was so easy to assemble and they love it! I'm really glad we chose this bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: and portability is surprisingly EASY!! Love it
customer_reviews.text: Incredible quality, and portability is surprisingly EASY!! Love it, well worth your money! Thank you Green Frog!
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: Best bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: After trying 3 different bassinets we purchased this one and our baby love it!
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: great cradle
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the cradle. Baby is almost 2 mo. old and she loves it. Had to wash and air out the foam mattress initially due to the chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: Ahubenko

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: Great for home and easy to take with when you travel!
customer_reviews.author: Janet hedrick

customer_reviews.title: No knock against your product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had 2 others and she said the baby would not stay in either one so she wanted to use the money for other things.
customer_reviews.author: GAYNELL J. WILLIAMS-GEORGE

customer_reviews.title: this bassinet is beautiful, functional and my son said it was the ...
customer_reviews.text: this bassinet is beautiful, functional and my son said it was the EASIEST item he has had to assemble as a father! absolutely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: lori j glaserzakem

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bassinet was a baby shower gift and it was greatly appreciated
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A. Kernen

customer_reviews.title: Received in great condition and on time too from supplier
customer_reviews.text: Exactly wanted we expected and wanted. Received in great condition and on time too from supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Armineh Rosenwald

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy setup and easy break down to travel with! Fits perfect in our small master bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Pillette

customer_reviews.title: Small, cute & functionable
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this bassinet, very convenient with wheels on the sides for ease of transportation & side openings that allow to see your baby; great grey color for my baby’s all grey/pink/white room.
customer_reviews.author: Darinka D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product that's worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that's worth the money! Durable, easy to set up and break down for traveling and our grandbaby loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Looks just like the photos ! Easy to essemble . Arrived promptly very pleased 😉
customer_reviews.author: Allison Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It was so easy to put together and it's adorable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cradle for my grandson. It was so easy to put together and it's adorable. Very sturdy. Perfect for small places
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this bassinet it was easy to assemble and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this bassinet it was easy to assemble and it's spacious but not too big that it takes over the room. My baby loves that it rocks and I love the mesh windows so I can watch her sleep. It also has wheels that make it easy to move from room to room. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Franco

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: First one I ordered arrived damaged so I returned it. Second one arrived damaged too. What gives?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So adorable! Breathable
customer_reviews.text: So adorable! Breathable, comfy, rocks, rolls. Five minute set-up! Everything I was looking for in a bassinet. Looks nice with other decor in the living room. Would be nice to have some storage though.
customer_reviews.author: Shamie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet is just the right size for my nephew and wife who live in a Manhattan apt.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with how lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with how lightweight, sturdy, yet chic it is. Really love how it completes our bedroom and provides a safe environment for our little one all at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: milana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very slick and beautiful Easy to move up and down stairs
customer_reviews.author: J. Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: this is SO easy to put together and it looks great
customer_reviews.text: First the pros: this is SO easy to put together and it looks great. The cons: it’s unusbale. My baby hates it and won’t lay in it for more than a few minutes. I’m hoping this may change as she gets bigger, but it’s huge for a newborn. I wish there was a newborn insert like the Halo sleeper has. This is my second baby, and neither one of them have liked being completely flat for sleeping. Sadly, as of right now (baby is five weeks) this is a waste of money and just sitting in the corner of the nursery unused. I wish I could return, but I bought a month prior to baby’s arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift for my daughter who is expecting and she absolutely loves it!!! That's going to be one happy baby!
customer_reviews.author: Dede

customer_reviews.title: It is of poor quality and the included sheet is as thin as ...
customer_reviews.text: The bassinet itself seems stable enough. The problem is with the mattress. It is of poor quality and the included sheet is as thin as toilet paper. Trying to find mattress covers/waterproof mattress covers has been fruitless and a complete waste of money. The fitted covers either make the mattress buckle so gaps are left between the crib and the mattress or flat covers can't properly be wrapped to prevent the sheet from bunching up and being (again) a safety hazard. Today we are going out and buying a new bassinet. To date I've wasted approximately $130 on this bassinet when I thought it was a great deal on sale at $89. Lesson here? The cheap becomes expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle de Carvalho e Branco

customer_reviews.title: Great for newborns
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for approx. 4 months. Still used for a couple more months for naps.
customer_reviews.author: Kim H.

feature_bullets: SAFETY FIRST: Low height and transparent mesh side windows ensures that you always have a view and easy reach of your baby, the gorgeous round windows also ensures plenty of airflow and ventilation.
LIGHTWEIGHT AND TRANSPORTABLE: Easy to move around the house just lift and glide on the custom designed wheels
PREMIUM MATTRESS AND SHEET INCLUDED: Includes a Premium-Comfort mattress with just the right firmness for a newborn baby, along with a washable cotton slipcover sheet
COMPLETELY WASHABLE: Fabric can be removed from the aluminum frame and washed
EASY ASSEMBLY: Totally easy to assemble or take apart with snap-on legs and rockers, comes with a gorgeous Green Frog carrying bag for on-the-go
